values: To pinch means to take a piece of skin between one’s fingers and squeeze.
I pinched my nose so I couldn’t smell the odor from the garbage.
n. 匮乏；少量；夹痛

- vt. 捏；勒索；使苦恼；掐掉某物，修剪
- n. 匮乏；少量；夹痛
- vi. 夹痛；节省
